00002 #include <limits>
00003 #include <iostream>
00004 #include <string>

00006 using namespace std;
00007 
00013 class Histogram {
00014 private:
00015     double Start, nBins_by_interval;
00016     unsigned int nBins;
00017     unsigned int number;
00018     unsigned int* freq;
00019     double minValue, maxValue, mean, deviation, total;
00020 public:
00027     Histogram(const double& Start, const double& End, const unsigned int& nBins) :
00028         Start(Start), nBins_by_interval(nBins / (End - Start)), nBins(nBins),
00029                 freq(new unsigned int[nBins]) {
00030         reset();
00031     }
00032 
00037     Histogram(const Histogram& other) :
00038         Start(other.Start), nBins_by_interval(other.nBins_by_interval), nBins(
00039                 other.nBins), freq(new unsigned int[nBins]) {
00040         for (unsigned int i(0); i < nBins; ++i)
00041             freq[i] = other.freq[i];
00042     }
00043 
00047     void reset() {
00048         for (unsigned int i(0); i < nBins; ++i)
00049             freq[i] = 0U;
00050         number = total = mean = deviation = 0;
00051         minValue = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00052         maxValue = std::numeric_limits<double>::min();
00053 
00054     }
00055 
00057     ~Histogram() {
00058         delete[] freq;
00059     }
00060 
00066     Histogram& operator=(const Histogram& other) {
00067         if (this != &other) {
00068             Start = other.Start;
00069             nBins_by_interval = other.nBins_by_interval;
00070             if (nBins != other.nBins) {
00071                 nBins = other.nBins;
00072                 delete[] freq;
00073                 freq = new unsigned int[nBins];
00074             }
00075             for (unsigned int i(0); i < nBins; ++i)
00076                 freq[i] = other.freq[i];
00077         }
00078         return *this;
00079     }
00080 
00086     void Add(const double& x, int ntimes) {
00087         number += ntimes;
00088         total += (x * ntimes);
00089         mean += (x * ntimes);
00090         deviation += (x * x) * ntimes;
00091         minValue = min(minValue, x);
00092         maxValue = max(maxValue, x);
00093 
00094         const unsigned int i(static_cast<unsigned int> ((x - Start)
00095                 * nBins_by_interval));
00096 
00097         if (i < nBins) {
00098             freq[i] += ntimes;
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00107     void Add(const double& x) {
00108         Add(x, 1);
00109     }
00110 
00114     void end() {
00115         mean = mean / number;
00116         deviation = deviation / number - mean * mean;
00117         deviation = sqrt(deviation);
00118     }
00119 
00124     void dumpStr(ostream &outfile) {
00125         int maxfreq = 0;
00126         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nBins && i <= maxValue; i++) {
00127             outfile << i << "  " << freq[i] << endl;
00128             maxfreq = freq[i] > maxfreq ? freq[i] : maxfreq;
00129         }
00130 
00131         outfile << "# Number: " << number << endl;
00132         outfile << "# Mean: " << mean << endl;
00133         outfile << "# Deviation: " << deviation << endl;
00134         outfile << "# Min: " << minValue << endl;
00135         outfile << "# Max: " << maxValue << endl;
00136 
00137         unsigned int max = 15;
00138         for (unsigned int i = maxValue < nBins ? maxValue : nBins; i > 15; i--) {
00139             if (freq[i] > maxfreq / 10000) {
00140                 max = i;
00141                 break;
00142             }
00143         }
00144         outfile << "# Latest: " << max << endl;
00145     }
00146 
00152     void dump(const char * name, const char *suffix) {
00153         string fileName(name);
00154         fileName.append(suffix);
00155         ofstream outfile;
00156 
00157         cout << "Writing histogram to: " << fileName << endl;
00158 
00159         outfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00160 
00161         dumpStr(outfile);
00162 
00163         outfile.close();
00164     }
00165 
00170     const unsigned int GetTotalCount() const {
00171         unsigned int c(0U);
00172         for (unsigned int i(0); i < nBins; ++i)
00173             c += freq[i];
00174         return c;
00175     }
00176 };
